name: Jakub Skwierawski
title: Full Stack Developer | Web3 & AI Solutions Architect
bio: Passionate self-taught developer specializing in full-stack web applications, blockchain solutions, and AI-powered platforms. With an intense focus on web3 development and emerging technologies, I build innovative products that bridge traditional software with decentralized systems. My journey began with coding in elementary school and intensified over the past three years into professional-grade development. I leverage AI to rapidly expand my skill set while maintaining deep technical expertise in smart contracts, dApps, and complex web applications. Recent achievements include winning 3rd place at ETH Warsaw 2025 and launching a production medical training platform. Always eager to take on new challenges and push the boundaries of what's possible with modern technology.

experience.title: Founder & Lead Developer
experience.description: Founded and developed an AI-powered medical emergency training platform for paramedic students and healthcare professionals. The platform provides realistic medical scenarios with intelligent assessment and progress tracking.
achievements: Launched production platform serving medical students across Poland (protokol999.pl)
Built advanced AI-powered scenario engine with real-time feedback
Implemented comprehensive analytics and progress tracking system
Aligned all content with ERC 2021 Guidelines for clinical accuracy
Created professional scenario builder for medical instructors
Achieved 24/7 cloud-based accessibility for flexible learning

experience.title: Co-Founder & Full Stack Developer
experience.description: Built award-winning Web3 mentorship platform connecting crypto newcomers with experienced mentors through AI-powered matching, video calls, and blockchain-secured payments. Secured 3rd place at ETH Warsaw 2025 hackathon.
achievements: Won 3rd place at ETH Warsaw 2025 hackathon
Developed AI-powered mentor-mentee matching algorithm
Implemented escrow smart contracts on Base blockchain
Integrated RedStone price feeds for multi-currency pricing
Built video call system with AI transcript analysis
Created Golem DB integration for decentralized data storage
Deployed on Base Sepolia testnet with OnchainKit

experience.title: Self-Employed Developer
experience.description: Building web applications, smart contracts, Telegram bots, AI-powered systems, and Web3 solutions. Specializing in full-stack development with focus on modern frameworks, blockchain technology, and AI/ML integrations including RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) systems.
achievements: Developed multiple dApps and smart contracts for EVM-compatible chains
Implemented RAG-powered AI systems with vector databases for semantic search
Built Python microservices with FastAPI for AI integrations
Created custom Telegram bots and automation tools
Built responsive web applications using modern frameworks
Contributed to open-source Web3 projects
Rapid skill acquisition through AI-assisted learning

projects.name: Interactive Portfolio with Guardian Security
projects.description: Advanced interactive portfolio website featuring dual AI chatbot system (DeepSeek Direct + RAG Assistant), sophisticated security framework, and retro terminal aesthetics. Built to showcase technical skills while implementing production-grade security measures, AI integrations, and semantic search capabilities using Python microservices.
features: Dual AI chatbot system - toggle between DeepSeek Direct and RAG Assistant
RAG Assistant with ChromaDB vector database for semantic search across portfolio, documentation, and security logs
Guardian Security System with prompt injection detection and session management
Real-time security audit logging and analytics dashboard
Easter egg challenge system with multi-level security puzzles
Retro CRT terminal theme with customizable visual effects (scanlines, glow, chromatic aberration)
GitHub integration displaying live contribution data and repository information
Responsive design with mobile-optimized chat interface
PostgreSQL database with Prisma ORM for data persistence
Rate limiting, IP blocking, and session suspension capabilities
highlights: Implemented RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) pipeline using Python, FastAPI, and ChromaDB vector database
Built comprehensive security system detecting and logging attack patterns with PostgreSQL
Created dual-mode AI chatbot allowing users to switch between direct API and RAG-enhanced responses
Designed modular Python microservice architecture with FastAPI for AI processing
Achieved sub-second semantic search across 5 knowledge collections using Sentence Transformers
Integrated real-time security analytics with AI-powered pattern analysis
Implemented vector embeddings and semantic similarity search for context-aware responses
Dockerized Python service for scalable deployment alongside Next.js frontend

aiFeatures.deepseekDirect: Fast, direct API responses using DeepSeek LLM with system prompts
aiFeatures.ragAssistant: Enhanced responses using semantic search across portfolio data, documentation, security logs, and custom documents via ChromaDB vector database
